The ACCurate Syncer

Sync live ACC commentary with your TV broadcast.

What is this?

A browser extension that lets you delay the Alternative Commentary Collective iHeart Radio stream so it syncs up with your TV picture. Radio is typically ahead of TV by 10-60 seconds — this extension lets you dial in the perfect offset.

How it works

  1. Open the ACC stream on iHeart Radio and press play
  2. Click the extension icon to open the syncer
  3. Hit the pause button — this mutes the audio and starts counting
  4. When you're ready, hit play — the stream rewinds by the elapsed time
  5. Fine-tune with the +/- 5s nudge buttons

Install

Coming soon to the Chrome Web Store and Firefox Add-ons. In the meantime, you can load it as an unpacked extension from the GitHub repo.
